prompt: Create a clean and minimalistic forgot password screen with a light theme. The screen should feature a centered layout with a prominent 'Forgot Password?' title at the top in dark gray (Colors.grey[800]). Below the title, include explanatory text in medium gray (Colors.grey[600]) that reads 'Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password.' Add a single email input field with a border outline, email keyboard type, and 'Enter your email' hint text. Include a full-width elevated button with blue background (Colors.blue) and white text saying 'Send Reset Link'. Add a TextButton below with 'Back to Login' text in blue color. Use generous padding (24.0) around the content and space elements with SizedBox(height: 24.0) for a clean, breathable layout. The overall background should be white.
